title: Wes Streeting – 2021 Comments on Gavin Williamson
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Wes Streeting, the Shadow Minister for Schools, on 1 January 2021.
content:
New year, same old story from Gavin Williamson and the Tories: dither and delay, creating added stress, chaos and confusion. Then an inevitable u-turn.
